Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium pink-brown; blue-grey core. Circular stamp with bucraneum symbol.
Type series: KT366 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '440'; ink '440'. Names, Damokrates, Aristokles.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (314)
